title: Best Santa Fe hotels with EV charging stations
excerpt: Finding hotels in Santa Fe that offer electric vehicle charging stations can be a challenge, especially as more travelers seek eco-friendly options. This curated list highlights the best accommodations equipped with EV charging, making it easier for you to plan a sustainable getaway without the stress of locating charging facilities. With these recommendations, you can enjoy both the charm of Santa Fe and the convenience of seamless travel for your electric vehicle.
intro: Discover the top hotels in Santa Fe that cater to electric vehicle owners with convenient charging stations.

hotels.name: Courtyard Santa Fe
hotels.description: Courtyard Santa Fe is conveniently located just 5 miles from Santa Fe Airport, making it an ideal choice for travelers. Guests can enjoy modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and a minibar in each room, along with healthy breakfast options and Starbucks coffee at The Bistro. With features like an indoor heated saltwater pool, a fitness center, and proximity to attractions like the Georgia O'Keefe Museum, this hotel promises a comfortable and memorable stay.
hotels.highlight: Courtyard Santa Fe provides electric vehicle charging stations alongside modern amenities and a heated saltwater pool.

hotels.name: The Inn of Five Graces
hotels.description: Experience the enchanting blend of historic charm and modern amenities at The Inn of Five Graces, where each uniquely designed room showcases vibrant East Indian and Tibetan furnishings, complete with a cozy fireplace and complimentary Wi-Fi. Delight your palate with on-site dining and cook-to-order breakfasts, followed by relaxation at the spa or on the terrace amidst lush gardens. Nestled in Santa Fe's historic district, the inn provides easy access to cultural gems like the Historic Plaza and Canyon Road Galleries, making it the perfect retreat for an unforgettable getaway.
hotels.highlight: The Inn of Five Graces provides E-bike charging alongside uniquely designed rooms and on-site dining in a historic setting.

hotels.name: Santa Fe Motel & Inn
hotels.description: Santa Fe Motel & Inn boasts a prime location just a 10-minute stroll from the Georgia O’Keeffe Museum, making it perfect for art lovers. Guests will appreciate the comfortable rooms equipped with modern amenities, including flat-screen TVs and kitchenettes in select accommodations. With convenient business center services and nearby attractions like The Plaza and Lensic Performing Arts Center, your stay promises to be both enjoyable and productive.
hotels.highlight: Santa Fe Motel & Inn offers convenient e-bike charging stations alongside comfortable rooms and a prime location near top attractions.

hotels.name: Inn on the Alameda
hotels.description: Experience the perfect retreat at Inn on the Alameda, located in the heart of Santa Fe. Enjoy relaxation with two hot tubs, a well-equipped fitness center, and delightful dining at our on-site restaurant and bar. With complimentary Wi-Fi, daily housekeeping, and convenient self-parking, your stay promises both comfort and convenience for an unforgettable getaway.
hotels.highlight: Offers electric vehicle charging stations alongside a relaxing garden and a showcase of local artists.

hotels.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Santa Fe
hotels.description: Experience comfort and convenience at Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Santa Fe, featuring an indoor pool, hot tub, and fitness center for your leisure. Located just 8.6 km from Santa Fe Plaza, the hotel offers modern rooms equipped with free WiFi, flat-screen TVs, and select accommodations with microwaves and refrigerators. Enjoy exceptional service at the 24-hour front desk and explore nearby attractions like the Georgia O'Keeffe Museum for a memorable getaway.
hotels.highlight: Features electric vehicle charging stations, an indoor pool, hot tub, and modern rooms with free WiFi at Fairfield Inn & Suites.

hotels.name: Inn at Santa Fe, SureStay Collection by Best Western
hotels.description: The SureStay Collection by Best Western Inn at Santa Fe boasts a prime location just minutes from the vibrant Santa Fe Plaza, making it perfect for exploring local attractions. Guests can enjoy modern amenities in comfortable rooms that feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and essential kitchen appliances. The hotel also offers relaxing facilities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and a cozy social area with a fireplace, along with a complimentary full American breakfast to start your day right.
hotels.highlight: Inn at Santa Fe, SureStay Collection by Best Western offers E-bike charging stations along with modern amenities and outdoor relaxation facilities.

faqs.question: Which hotels in Santa Fe offer Tesla charging stations?
faqs.answer: Several hotels in Santa Fe provide Tesla charging stations, including the La Fonda on the Plaza and the Hotel Santa Fe. It is advisable to call ahead to confirm availability, as some hotels may have limited charging spots.

faqs.question: Are there any fees for using EV charging stations at Santa Fe hotels?
faqs.answer: Fees for using EV charging stations can vary by hotel. Some hotels may offer complimentary charging for guests, while others might charge a nominal fee. Always check the hotel's policies or inquire at the front desk during check-in.

faqs.question: What amenities do Santa Fe hotels with EV charging stations typically offer?
faqs.answer: Hotels with EV charging stations often provide additional amenities such as complimentary Wi-Fi, on-site dining, and fitness centers. Many also boast proximity to local attractions, making them convenient for travelers looking to explore the area.

faqs.question: How do I find the best hotel rates in Santa Fe with EV charging?
faqs.answer: To find the best rates for Santa Fe hotels with EV charging, consider booking directly through the hotel’s website or using reliable travel booking platforms. Additionally, check for seasonal promotions and discounts, especially during off-peak times.

faqs.question: What should I know about EV charging station locations when visiting Santa Fe?
faqs.answer: In addition to hotel charging stations, Santa Fe has several public charging locations, including at local shopping centers and attractions. It is wise to download an EV charging app to locate the nearest stations and check availability while exploring the city.
